Delicious aÃ§aÃ­ bowl, with option to self-create. Generous ingredients and toppings. Fruits were fresh too.
A rather narrow seating area but sufficient and cosy for my hubby and I.

Surprised by an incredibly generous portion for the price!! Acai itself tastes like most other acai but goodness me the portion filled 2 greedy people who already had lunch! Generous cacao nibs, granola and cookie butter!

For the price im not sure buying acai from the supermarkets is any cheaper...

Would make the trip to this neighbourhood outlet again :)
